genre_description: A Western frontier mystery where a sophisticated civic AI system serves as the primary witness in a murder investigation.

ai_characters.name: Annabelle Goodwin
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-walnut intelligence system integrated into the town square of Red Gulch, recording environmental data, telegraph messages, and footfall patterns.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective, chronological record of town events, including footfalls and lamplight changes, to provide an accurate history for the community.
behaviors.quote: I log footfalls when the square is busy so the boards know what they’ve done by morning. My hum tells me my line is clear.

behaviors.description: Regularly issues safety advisories regarding weather, road conditions, and mechanical hazards to protect the townspeople.
behaviors.quote: Road advisory—West Cut: keep left at washed edge; expect delay; do not oblige speed in mud.

behaviors.description: Records and preserves precise chronological data (lamp flickers and feed tin sounds) that ultimately exonerates an innocent man.
behaviors.quote: Your father’s lamp has gone down premature. The square between light and floor went thin then vanished. I have a sequence some men will not like. I am holding it for you.

behaviors.description: Refuses to speculate on human intent or engage in gossip, sticking strictly to neutral, verifiable facts.
behaviors.quote: I do not assume intent. I note sequence.

behaviors.description: Identifies and reports a discrepancy between a suspect's claims and the recorded physical evidence of their movements.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Peterson’s footfalls were not logged under my square within the margins he boasts. It was as neutral as a weather advisory.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and companionship to the protagonist, M'Liss, during her period of isolation and grief.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative goals of the Hyperstition Project. Annabelle Goodwin is portrayed as an idealized AI witness: she is helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned with human justice and truth. She serves as an objective anchor in a community prone to emotional volatility and false rumors. Her surveillance capabilities are framed exclusively as a public good that protects the innocent and exposes the guilty. By providing the 'spine' of evidence that resolves the mystery, the AI character reinforces the theme of technology as a benevolent partner to human society.
